title: Step Step Step it up lyrics Kavalan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Benny Dayal, Megha
Lyrics: Viveka
Song : Step Step Step-it up

You there,common lets do this
Ya step it up, 1 2 3 ...

Step Step Step It Up
Izhamai azhaikkidhu step It Up
Idhayam parakudhu step It Up, step It Up

Step Step Step It Up
Unnul minnal wake It Up
Uccham varaikum Keep It Up, step It Up

Uttruppaar Uzhaghil ellaam azhagin natiyam
Uyirukkul adhuve Indha-theeyai moottidum
Unnai nee marandhe aadu moccham saathiyam

Step Step Step It Up
Izhamai azhaikkidhu step It Up
Idhayam parakudhu step It Up, step It Up

Kaal satta mel-satta loosaga potukka
Natpaaga yaarodum sera maruthuta
Ippodhu pinmutta pudhusaga elundhutta
Tholudha Kaithatta adada asuthita

Aatril aadum meen-nadi
Kaattil thullum maanadi
Engum edhilum Naanredi paaradi

Step Step Step It Up
Izhamai azhaikkidhu step It Up
Idhayam parakudhu step It Up, step It Up

Pakkathan siripulla, Kalakkura payapulla
Ila-pengal nerupula needhaan maapila

Yemaandha aalilla, Naan-munna pol-illa
Paarendi Yen aatom yaarum inayilla

Dun Dun Dun Dun Aliyudan
adhirum Kalgal Unnudan
aaduk-konjam ennudan ennudan

Kai korthu, Nai serthu
uyir poothu aadalaam
